name: Rhyperior
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: From holes in its palms, it fires out Geodude. Its carapace can withstand volcanic eruptions.

abilities.name: Toppling Wind
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may discard the top 3 cards of your opponent’s deck.

attacks.name: Rock Wrecker
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance. This Pokémon can’t attack during your next turn.
